item.title: Ascent Solar Technologies Inc 10-K
item.description: Ascent Solar Technologies Inc, which is in the Semiconductors & Related Devices [3674] industry, SEC 10-K filing on May 14, 2021 had 30180 (cleaned) words - 600 were utilized for the visualizations. Top Words: company - 399 instances stock - 284 instances 2020 - 272 instances december - 227 instances may - 225 instances See the parsed data used in the visualization here.
